summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5437 for the improvement of 36th Avenue West, from Viewmont Way to Magnolia Boulevard; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 68452 as amended by Ordinance No. 69159, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
